entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries beginning near midnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 9 April 2023
